data.description: The Personalized Family Name Metal Sign is a high-quality, custom-made sign that can be used as a door hanger, housewarming gift, wedding monogram, or anniversary gift. It is made from 14 gauge cold roll carbon steel and finished with a 20 year uv/weatherproof industrial powder coat, ensuring durability and longevity. The sign is available in a wide range of sizes, from 10" to 96", and can be customized with any name or initial. The metal is cut and hand finished in the USA from a 200 year old family owned steel mill, adding a sense of heritage and craftsmanship to the product. The sign is cut and shipped within 24 hours or the following business day when ordered before noon, making it an ideal choice for customers who need a personalized gift or sign quickly.

data.description:
Wrap Your Loved One in Warmth and Magic: Custom-Printed Blankets
Every child and grownup deserves the warmth and comfort of a soft, cozy blanket that's uniquely their own. Our custom-printed blankets are designed to make bedtime and cuddle time extra special. Crafted with the softest materials and customizable with your loved one's name, these blankets are more than just a source of warmth; they're a canvas for dreams and imagination.

Our blankets are printed in the United States onto a super soft minky fleece fabric that will stay plush and vibrant through a lifetime of washings.

With our state-of-the-art shop, we can turn around orders in 1 to 3 days. Pick your perfect pairing of color and font style, supply the name, and you'll have an amazing gift that's truly one-of-a-kind in about a week!

Notes
* Our blankets are printed on one side, and the reverse side is a clean white color.
* We will try to reach out if we notice any obvious typos or mistakes in our customization selections.
* Machine wash cold, and tumble dry on low heat

uniqueAttributes.Personalized: Our blankets are custom-printed with your loved one's name, making them a truly one-of-a-kind gift.
uniqueAttributes.Soft and cozy: Crafted with the softest minky fleece fabric, our blankets provide unparalleled warmth and comfort for all ages.
uniqueAttributes.Vibrant colors: With over 30 colors to choose from, you can find the perfect match to complement any décor or personal style.
uniqueAttributes.Quick turnaround time: Our state-of-the-art shop allows us to turn around orders in just 1 to 3 days, ensuring that your gift arrives promptly.
uniqueAttributes.Machine washable: Our blankets are machine washable and dryable, making them easy to care for and maintain their softness over time.

data.description:
These leather totes are every bit as great as you could think they are.
We make these totes from the very scratch. We choose exceptionally beautiful leather and step by step, it's gently transformed into one of your most durable everyday accessories.
The inside doesn't have any pockets or linings - it's just the great leather, with no elements to break and tear.
Sizes are shown and detailed in the listing pictures.
Leather
I use distressed top grain cowhide leather, of the best quality. It's solid, but very soft.
The distressed nature allows it to age beautifully, writing down the life story of it's owner.
Making
You are in the maker's shop. These bags are cut and sewn from the very scratch.
You receive an object made with warmth and personal care, coming from a small studio, where people laugh, joke, and listen to the good music.
Personalize. Because it's free!
The bag is branded with a custom name/initials/monogram. Branding can be done on the outside and/or on the inside.
Please provide information about names, letters, monogram style, stamp color(plain/gold), personalization patch color in "note to the seller" at the checkout, or in the "Personalization" field before the checkout.
Please note that personalized bags cannot be returned. But as you can see from our customer's feedback, there would be no reason for the return.

data.description: This ceramic lamp, with a light and homely color, combines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green with a slight touch of orange-red on top. It is handmade in a small boutique studio in Tel Aviv. The lamp is 7.9-inch \ 24 cm in height (without the bulb) and 7.9-inch \ 20 cm diameter. It comes with 60 inches \ 150 cm golden textile cable and a terracotta 4-inch \ 10 cm ceiling rose. It is suitable for standard E27 bulb, Voltage 110V-250V | 25 to 40W max. Energy-saving LED light bulbs are recommended. This product is made to order by hand, so that it may be slightly different from the one in the photo. Please allow 1-2 weeks production time before shipping. This object can be ordered in various colors and prints.
